s.text: The latest circulation audit shows that nine of the nation's fifteen largest newspapers recorded an increase in daily circulation, reports the WP . And nearly two-thirds of all papers with circulations over 200,000 recorded gains.

The latest circulation audit shows that nine of the nation's fifteen largest newspapers recorded an increase in daily circulation, reports the WP . And nearly two-thirds of all papers with circulations over 200,000 recorded gains.
Prior to yesterday, the paper explains, this rider was required because independent sellers could not be forced to charge the price in question.
But it's below the fold at USAT and on p.
The story is featured in the WSJ 's "world-wide" news box, and it's above the fold of the LAT front.
The LAT lead story on this decision includes the provenance of a common ad phrase: "offer good at participating stores only."
